document.discussion_title: First Look: Atsu Sekhoseâ€™s Winter/Festive collection for Lakme Fashion Week 2016
document.topic_text: First Look: Atsu Sekhose's Winter/Festive collection for Lakme Fashion Week 2016 FP Staff Aug 12, 2016 11:14 IST #Atsu Sekhose #Buzz Patrol #Fashion #Fashion show #Lakme Fashion Week #Lakme Fashion Week 2016 #LFW #model #Pernia Qureshi #RAMP With Lakme Fashion Week just round the corner we present a small peep into the collection by acclaimed designer Atsu Sekhose. Lakme Fashion Week Winter/Festive 2016, jointly organised by Lakme, the number one cosmetics and beauty services brand in India, and IMG Reliance Pvt Ltd, leader in sports, fashion and entertainment marketing and management, has been conceived and created with a vision to "Redefine the future of fashion and integrate India into the global fashion world." The winter/festive season of the Lakme Fashion Week, that is organised twice every year, will be held from 24-28 August this year.
